ingredients.item: 200g green beans, trimmed and cut into short lengths
Â½ x 20g pack flat leaf parsley, roughly chopped

instructions.step: Put the stock in a large saucepan and bring to the boil. Add the onion, fennel and garlic, then simmer for 7-8 minutes until fragrant.
Add the courgettes, beans and peas, bring back to the boil and simmer for another 5 minutes.

Increase the heat to high and bring the soup to the boil. Add the ravioli and simmer for 3 minutes - the pasta should still be al dente. Season, ladle into 4 bowls and top with the shredded chicken and chopped parsley.
